features: Made in Canada Construction: Innovative horizontal baffle construction to maximize insulation benefits and prevent the down from moving
Zipper: YKK two-way zipper, protected by a windproof flap with hidden snaps
Hood: Fixed with internal headband adjustment
Cuffs: Storm cuffs insulated for a secure and comfortable fit

Pockets: Two utility pockets with snaps concealed by a sleek flap. Two zippered hand pockets lined in microthermal polyester. Interior zippered pocket for easy access and the safe storage of essential items
Signature Quartz Co. patch: Black Alcantara Suede
tech_specs.\u2022 Technical outer fabric: 57% polyester/43% REPREVE® polyester (recycled fibres from plastic bottles), bluesign® certified
tech_specs.\u2022 Insulation: 650 Canadian white-duck down sourced from ethical farms and of certified traceable origin
tech_specs.\u2022 Care: Machine washable in cold water using gentle cycle and mild soap; no fabric softener. Machine dry on low heat with washing balls. Store in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight
